definition: Xingshan county in Yichang 宜昌[Yi2 chang1], Hubei
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Zhaojun Village lies in Xingshan County, northwest of Hubei Province.
sentences.chinese: 昭君村位於鄂西北地區興山縣境內。
